Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0461
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when --HLGT is not on the path to MedDRA primary system
  organ class
Outcome:
  Message: --HLGT is not on the path to MedDRA primary system organ class
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0461
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The high-level term code from the primary hierarchy
                  assigned to the event from MedDRA.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --HLTCD
                Section: Events
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - EVENTS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - AE
      - CE
      - MH
